message: OK I'll bite. Which part of Flash do you love?
Instant on capabilities. No moving parts allows skipfree playback of music. It's allows my electronics to be slimlined. I love flash memory too!!
one of you guys got whoooshed
Um, I think he is referring to Adobe Flash as opposed to solid state memory
yeah, and i love my trenchcoat and also mardi gras
I love how it makes pictures brighter in the dark.
Html5 allows you to embed videos without flash. Woohoo!
When it gets cold I load a flash-enabled site on my laptop and enjoy the warmth it causes my laptop to emit!
Flash feeds my FB Game addiciton,  guilty pleasure.  :-)
@barkerja that's hilarious -- in the winter flash will always keep you warm
why u guys hate flash so much. Flash is only one way of doing things. If you don't like it, just find some alternative solutions.
@manuel4 It's hard to use an alternative solution when you're not the person who controls application/website. Example: All restaurant sites.
